reviews.review_msg: Sarb really cares about her students and wants you to do well - and it shows. She replies quickly and effectively to emails and questions, at all times of the day. If you apply yourself, you will do well in this class. Exams are based mostly on lecture material, but reading the textbook definitely helps understand concepts.
Terrible prof, doesnt care about her students. She comes across as conceited and doesnt try to explain the material properly. If you question her once shell pick on you in class forever.

Sarb makes you work for the grade. She wants to know that you understand the content, and know how it comes into play into your current role.  You should be there to learn, not get an easy pass for your certificate.

Sarb is a good teacher but she's tough The lectures are pretty long but only because she feels that everything in the text is important and should be included in the lecture. Attend all the classes, if possible - it will help on the exams. Papers are also tough as grammar and spelling counts. Good luck!

Absolutely the worst instructor I have ever had.  Not helpful, not approachable, condescending and rude.  Management from SFU should audit her class to see what a poor instructor she is.  I have avoided taking a number of classes in the HR certificate program to avoid having her again.
Boring, terrible instructor, read from book.  I spent good money on that class and its something I could have done at home on my own with the textbook.  Total waste of time.  I was very disappointed.

Anthony is a fantastic professor. He has a way of bringing Organizational Behaviour to life. One would say he is a transformational leader, who really encourages you to think differently, strive for better, and truly be immersed in your education. I highly recommend every to take Anthony's class, especially if you are new to the HR realm.

Anthony was delightful to listen to and passionate about teaching. His passion and excitement are inspiring and motivating to learn more and do well in the class. I enjoyed this class a lot! It was perfect for me to take on while working FT but still challenging and interesting.

I really appreciated being able to attend a class by Anthony. His engagement, energy and knowledge had a real world focus that made a virtual class feel warm and welcoming. I would highly recommend his classes.

Anthony is an amazing teacher and I feel that he truly wants to connect with us and have what he has taught to impact our lives. I definitely took a lot from this course that I can apply not only to my professional life, but my personal life as well. I wish there were more courses I could take with Anthony!

Anthony is the best professor I have ever had and probably will ever have. He is a true leader, by encouraging and inspiring us to do our best. I loved this class and I am so glad I took it at the beginning of my HRM certificate program, I believe he has set me up for a successful future! I cant wait to take more of Anthonys classes in future!

Anthony is a great professor that truly wants his students to succeed. Makes himself available outside of class and is very responsive. Lectures are interactive and material is presented in a variety of ways, which is great for all types of learners. He is very respectful of every student and goes above and beyond. Highly recommended professor!

Anthony was the best instructor I've ever had. He brings concepts to life with real world examples and experience, and encourages thought provoking conversations. His course will not only help my career, but my life. It's that good. I would take any class that Anthony was instructing.

Anthony is an amazing leader! I learned so much about my organization and more importantly about myself. I realized how I can contribute to my organization. Anthony truly understands OB and communicates well. He makes each student feel valued. He goes above and beyond for all students. Anthony should teach more courses. I would sign up for them all

Anthony is a hands on teacher. He made sure that everyone had a voice in the class then reflected on everyone's comments. He offers so much more than the book used for the class. In my opinion he goes beyond the call of duty as a teacher.

So glad he has his lectures available post class so I could get a true feeling for the course and Anthony because I work a full time and part time job. Wish other profs were just as flexible. Great content.
Anthony was a very engaging professor that provided a great deal of relevant information. I liked the encouragement of open discussion. Thumbs up.

Anthony has a way of inspiring the class and encourages group work and participation. His lectures were always engaging and he was able to relate course material to current affairs and help students work through real world problems. I would highly recommend taking one of his classes!

Anthony, was an excellent instructor and I couldn't have been happier with the course. I learned a lot of new ideas and concepts. One of his greatest strengths was actually his ability to provide greater clarity and insight into previously explored concepts, in order for them to resonate on a deeper intellectual and emotional level.

Really good prof & interesting course. Lots of reading & work - individual and group assignments, essay, midterm & final - but he makes it interesting and does a good job of communicating his expectations for the course. Took the course out of interest (i.e. not for credit) & would definitely consider taking another course if he s teaching it.

Anthony was a great teacher, if you work hard you will do well in his class. He is pretty fair with his marking. He goes above and beyond with his presentations adding a lot of additional & useful info. Class was never boring, always very engaging! Really genuine, nice guy!

I have taken quite a few business courses but Anthony has literally been the best instructor I've ever experienced. He kept the class engaged with interactive real-word discussions. He used his real life work experiences, his prezi slides were amazing and he shared all his materials. He sincerely wanted all to learn, succeed. Hope he teaches more.
Honestly cares soooo much about his students and obviously cares about the subject. He set the bar so high for my future profs he really knows how to teach.

Anthony is a great teacher, he packs a lot of information into his lectures and manages to keep the information relevant and interesting. Sometimes the lessons over ran and assignments maybe took longer than expected for a continued Ed. course. but the assignments were truly challenging and helped me learn the material better than if shorter.

Anthony is a genuinely good person and cares about his students' success not just in the class but in life as well. If you actually want to learn and don't mind working hard for a good grade then I highly reccomend taking his classes.

Anthony is a fantastic teacher he has the experience and personality that makes him easy to learn from and listen to. Although the class has a heavy course load, I feel I have learned more from this class than any other. Refreshing compared to the teachers I am usually use to. Totally recommend!!
